original_text: Because there was not yet a temple where people could give honour to the Lord, they offered sacrifices at altars in other places.
korean_text: 그 때까지 여호와의 이름을 위하여 성전을 아직 건축하지 아니하였으므로 백성들이 산당에서 제사하며

sentences.original_text: Because there was not yet a temple
where people could give honour to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 주께 경배를 드릴 수 있는 곳이
